title: Cannot add riot points on game.
body: I have no add riot points button on my store... help?

replies.body: It was fixed when I updated to the newest client. Thank you for the help !

Are you using the Legacy (current) or Alpha/Beta Client? Try [running a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) of League's files to see if it pops up afterward.

Let me know what happens!
I ran the repair and it did not work. I'm using OSX so that could be the problem.

Can you [grab a screenshot](https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT201361) of what you're seeing in the store, then upload it to [Imgur](https://imgur.com/) and link me? I'd like to have a closer look at this issue.
